select recommend.id as recommendId, recommend.goodsId , recommend.sort , goods.shopId shopId, goods.goodsName goodsName, goods.category category, goods.mainImg mainImg, goods.batchNumber batchNumber, goods.targetUrl targetUrl, goods.stock stock, goods.priceScore priceScore, goods.priceMarket priceMarket, goods.validStartTime validStartTime, goods.validEndTime validEndTime, goods.shopId shopId from goods_recommend as recommend INNER JOIN goods as goods on recommend.goodsId = goods.id
recommend.shopId = #{shopId} and recommend.isDeleted = 0
and goodsName list CONCAT(#{goodsName},'%')
order by sort DESC
